pilot:ProtectPower.NAME: Protect
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you take damage, reduce your Titan's #yShield instead.
The next #b%1$s times you take damage, reduce your Titan's #yShield instead.

pilot:ProtectThisTurnPower.NAME: Temporary Protect
DESCRIPTIONS: The next time you take damage this turn, reduce your Titan's #yShield instead.
The next #b%1$s times you take damage this turn, reduce your Titan's #yShield instead.

pilot:LoseProtectPower.NAME: Lose Protect
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, lose #b%1$s #yProtect.

pilot:StriderPower.NAME: Strider
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yDeploy your Titan, give it #b%1$s #yShields and shuffle #b%2$s Dash into your draw pile.

pilot:RoninPower.NAME: Ronin
DESCRIPTIONS: When you #yDeploy your Titan, give it #b%1$s #yShields and shuffle #b%2$s LeadWall and #b%2$s Phase Dash into your draw pile.

pilot:MomentumPower.NAME: Momentum
DESCRIPTIONS: Increases #yBlock gained from cards by #b%1$s. At end of turn, reduce #yMomentum by the number of cards in your hand.

pilot:Protocol3Power.NAME: Protocol 3
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%1$s #yProtect.

pilot:AdvancedAutoTitanPower.NAME: Advanced Auto Titan
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b%1$s #yArmament.
At the start of your turn, draw #b%1$s #yArmamentss.

pilot:ApexFormPower.NAME: Apex Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, gain #b%1$s #yMomentum.
